paper_abstract: We briefly survey several existing methods for solving polynomial systems with inexact coefficients, then introduce our new symbolic-numeric method which is based on the geometric (Jet) theory of partial differential equations. The method is stable and robust. Numerical experiments illustrate the performance of the new method. (C) 2008 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Solving polynomial systems via symbolic-numeric reduction to geometric involutive form
